extendedInfo.description: This is the free version with reduced font capabilities. Consider upgrading to the full version if you like this app and want more fonts, or just plain like me. This is my first app (a hello world of sorts)Full Version at:https://market.android.com/details?id=com.denniston.ryan.wordwallpaperMy Word Live Wallpaper is a fully custom scrolling text screen saver. Remember that old school scrolling marquee from those age old Microsoft Windows computers you might still have thrown around somewhere? Well this totally customizable throwback wallpaper rings true to its name. Want to leave a love note for your boyfriend/girlfriend? Leave yourself a reminder? Memorable quote? Let everyone know this phone is "not theirs?" Cheerful holiday message? Or just the paradoxical: "The only sentence on this screen is false." This wallpaper can do it all and then some with over 32 different fonts (full version only), fully custom background color, text color, size and speed! This is a scrolling text or scrolling banner app!

reviews.title: Awesome... Awesome
reviews.comment: Greatest customizable word banners with excellent fonts and colors. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User
